original_title: Inerrancy and the Undermining of Biblical Authority
overview: Most evangelicals today say the Bible is without error in matters of theology and morality, but they doubt or deny that the earth is only about 6,000 years old, as Scripture seems to indicate. They insist that the age of the earth is an unimportant side-issue that is a matter of interpretation of Scripture, not inerrancy. Can someone believe in an inerrant Bible and believe the earth is millions of years old? Consider Dr. Mortensonâ€™s thoughts on these important questions. Discover why this issue really does matter!
tagline: Is the Bible without error? Can someone believe in an inerrant Bible and believe the earth is millions of years old? Does this issue really matter?
